name: Sugar Rush (itch) (Bossch)
description:
In this game you play as a cute sugar cube who is desperate to reach the coffee cup. Unaware of the chaos is unleaches behind him!

Ingame you can find a online leaderbord to compete with other players.

This is my first game and thus so my first game jam, because of this and a small lack of time managment the game only has 1 level and could improve a bit. So all the feedback is welcome!

Disclaimer: this game is a chaotic hard platformer and the developper is not responsible for outburst or rage quits. I wish you the best of luck.
